cards.title: Patiala Babes
cards.description: Mini, a young girl, encourages her traditional mother, Babita, to realise her worth and fulfil her dreams. [TV SHOW] [ENTERTAINMENT]
Two playboys who hail from different locales come face-to-face and are shocked to discover that they are look-a-likes. [MOVIE] [HINDI MOVIE]
cards.title: Krishnarjuna Yuddham
TIN TỨC 24h
cards.description: 24h hay Tin tức 24h là một trang tin điện tử tại Việt Nam. [TV SHOW] [NEWS]

cards.title: My Happy Home | 즐거운 나의 집
cards.description: Genius scientist Sejeong lives with her cyborg husband Sungmin. She erased Sungmin’s memories and inputted new customized memories and information of her choosing, so she is able to enjoy a blissful marriage. Then someone Sejeong and Sungmin knew before he became a cyborg starts coming to their home. This person tries to correct Sungmin’s distorted memories while Sejeong tries to stop her. Sungmin, in the meantime, starts lying like a human being. What happened before Sungmin was turned into a cyborg? Cast: Son Yeo-eun, Lee Sangyeob, Kim Myungsoo, Lee Ilhwa, Park Hana, Lim Jikyu, Song Yoona, Ok Taecyeon

cards.title: Don't Worry, I'm a Ghost | 걱정마세요, 귀신입니다
cards.description: A man wakes up at the hospital following an accident. He can’t remember his name, his family or where he lives. He learns his name and address from the police who ran his fingerprints and goes to his house. He sleeps an uncomfortable sleep and finds a girl looking at him when he wakes up. She says she’s a ghost. Lee Mungi thinks he’s seeing things due to aftereffects of the accident but finds her picture at her funeral. Her name was Kim Yeonhwa and he wants to know why she came to him. He asks her if she wants him to find the suspect and get revenge. But she says the police can do that and tells him he has a more important job to do. She tells him the reason she came to him is in his lost memories. Cast: Bong Tae-gyu, Park Shin-hye, Lee Ha-yool, Park Seo-yeon
